mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO paper_question( id, paper_id, question_id, question_type, score_type, question_score, full_score, assign_score, correct_type ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.paperId}, #{item.questionId}, #{item.questionType}, #{item.scoreType}, #{item.questionScore}, #{item.fullScore}, #{item.assignScore}, #{item.correctType} )
mapper.select: SELECT pq.question_type AS questionType, pq.question_score AS questionScore, pq.full_score as fullScore, pq.score_type AS scoreType, pq.assign_score AS assignScore, pq.correct_type as correctType, bq.question_desc as questionDesc, bq.is_bank as isBank, bq.`options`, bq.answer, bq.`subject` FROM paper_question pq INNER JOIN base_questions bq ON pq.question_id = bq.id WHERE pq.paper_id = #{paperId} ORDER BY pq.question_type ASC,pq.question_id ASC
